MemberSignature.Value: public bool EraseSector (ReadOnlySpan<byte> newKeyA, ReadOnlySpan<byte> newKeyB, byte sector, bool authenticateWithKeyA, bool resetAccessBytes);

.method public hidebysig instance bool EraseSector(valuetype System.ReadOnlySpan`1<unsigned int8> newKeyA, valuetype System.ReadOnlySpan`1<unsigned int8> newKeyB, unsigned int8 sector, bool authenticateWithKeyA, bool resetAccessBytes) cil managed
Public Function EraseSector (newKeyA As ReadOnlySpan(Of Byte), newKeyB As ReadOnlySpan(Of Byte), sector As Byte, authenticateWithKeyA As Boolean, resetAccessBytes As Boolean) As Boolean
member this.EraseSector : ReadOnlySpan<byte> * ReadOnlySpan<byte> * byte * bool * bool -> bool

Docs.param: The new key A, empty to use current one
The new key B, empty to use current one
The sector number. Refer to Mifare documentation to understand how blocks work especially for Mifare 2K and 4K
True to authenticate with current Key A, false to authenticate with Key B
True to reset all the access bytes
Docs.summary: Erase one sector
Docs.remarks: Sector 0 can't be fully erase, only the blocks 1 and 2 will be erased
